explanation: [0-0] In a room, a young woman in a white top, a rose-colored skirt, and red high heels stands to the right of a black coat rack. She holds a yellow umbrella and a red umbrella in her right hand. Several clothes are hanging on the coat rack, and a few pairs of shoes are placed there. The walls of the room are blue, the floor is wooden, and there is a colorful mat at the door. In the lower right corner, there is a round, yellow-blue logo with the words "MINI MiMI" on it.

[0-5] First, the woman in white takes a yellow umbrella and a red umbrella from the coat rack. She turns around, facing the right, where a little boy in a yellow short-sleeved shirt, brown shorts, and suspenders is standing. The woman in white holds the yellow umbrella in her left hand and hands the red umbrella to the little boy in the yellow shirt. The shot cuts to a close-up of the little boy in the yellow shirt taking the red umbrella in his right hand, frowning, shaking his head, and turning his back to the front.
